segments.text: What a frustrating scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes while the sink floods the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water rushing out?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling all over the floor, and she's ankle-deep in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting badly; they're going to break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s stretched out, grabbing cookies with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister’s waiting eagerly, palm up like it's her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; the parent's not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m furious thinking about the damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the slippery floor— someone’s bound to fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should turn off that faucet right now!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, this whole thing is just maddening to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
